channel.title: Education on For Curious Minds
channel.description: Recent content in Education on For Curious Minds

item.title: Staying Up to Date
item.description: How am I staying up to date as a Software Engineer in 2025? Short answer is, I probably am not. Tech moves fast and people/companies are often going to lag behind. I’ve been learning and reading up on AI so I can understand the tool better, but that’s been the extent of my studies this year. I’m currently working through the book AI Engineering: Building Applications with Foundational Models. To me this is a good place to start, something applied on top of the next layer of abstraction.

item.title: What is For Curious Minds?
item.description: This website is dedicated to my dad who’s name I’ll omit out of respect for his love of privacy. One day I’ll write more about him but I’ll tell you a few things. He left me his Kindle library, he had me and my siblings in a group chat called “For Curious Minds”, and he was never afraid to tell you how he felt. He passed away from a brain injury about 4 years ago and his mind is what I’ll miss most about him.
